stages.title: Define Your Physics Vision
stages.description: Clarify your academic direction, target universities, and how physics fits into your long-term goals.

Global.overview: Top universities seek applicants who combine analytical ability with curiosity about the universe. Start by mapping your interests to elite programs.
checklist: Research 3–5 world-class physics programs (MIT, ETH, Cambridge, NUS)
Identify your preferred field (quantum, astro, materials, or theoretical)
Write a 3-year academic and extracurricular roadmap

resources.title: What Top Physics Departments Look For

US.overview: US universities value strong academics plus unique intellectual curiosity. Combine AP/IB rigor with a clear admissions plan.
checklist: Research reach, target, and safety schools for physics
Note AP Physics C and Calculus requirements
Plan your Common App personal statement theme

resources.title: Common App Essay Tips for STEM

UK.overview: UK programs prioritize A-levels and admissions tests. Focus early on UCAS and the Physics Aptitude Test (PAT).
checklist: Review entry requirements for Oxford, Cambridge, and Imperial
Start PAT preparation (Year 12)
Outline a UCAS personal statement draft

Asia.overview: Bridge national curricula (CBSE, IB, HKDSE, JEE) to global admissions standards while developing your research mindset.
checklist: Review physics topics overlapping JEE/IB HL content
Identify international physics competitions (IPhO, APhO)
Explore scholarships or summer schools abroad

quiz.q: Which region’s admissions emphasize the Physics Aptitude Test (PAT)?
What’s most valued by US universities in Physics applications?
opts: Unique research experiences and intellectual curiosity
quiz.correct: Unique research experiences and intellectual curiosity

stages.title: Strengthen Your Academic Edge
stages.description: Align your studies, standardized tests, and achievements to demonstrate academic excellence.

Global.overview: Admissions officers look for rigorous physics and math preparation across all regions.
checklist: Complete calculus-based physics modules (Mechanics, E&M)
Join a physics or math competition
Track progress using an academic portfolio

US.overview: Prioritize AP Physics and research-based extracurriculars.
checklist: Complete AP Physics C and AP Calculus BC
Join a mentorship or research program
Participate in USAPhO or Science Olympiad

UK.overview: Excel in A-level Physics and prepare for PAT/NSAA assessments.
checklist: Solve 5 past PAT papers
Strengthen problem-solving under timed conditions
Engage with Isaac Physics challenges

Asia.overview: Integrate physics excellence with Olympiads and national exams like JEE/NEET.
checklist: Complete JEE Advanced-level Mechanics and Optics
Take 2 practice sets from IPhO or APhO archives
Write one reflection connecting physics to tech innovation

quiz.q: What’s the best way to prove academic rigor in US physics applications?
opts: Strong AP/IB results and Olympiad participation
quiz.correct: Strong AP/IB results and Olympiad participation

stages.title: Research, Projects & Impact
stages.description: Turn your curiosity into tangible projects that impress admissions teams.

Global.overview: Admissions committees value originality — show it through hands-on physics or interdisciplinary projects.
checklist: Design an independent experiment or simulation
Publish your findings or share them online
Collaborate with peers globally

resources.title: How to Create a Research Portfolio

US.overview: Link projects to summer research programs and college applications.
checklist: Apply to MIT RSI or Stanford SIMR
Document your lab work in a portfolio
Create a Common App project entry

UK.overview: Integrate projects into your EPQ or UCAS statement to show initiative.
checklist: Draft an EPQ proposal on a physics topic
Link your project to university research themes
Include project outcomes in UCAS essays

Asia.overview: Use national fairs or Olympiad extensions to build standout portfolios.
checklist: Participate in local research competitions
Work under a university mentor
Translate project results into English for global submission

quiz.q: What’s the most impactful project for physics admissions?

stages.title: Craft Your Application Narrative
stages.description: Translate your academic and research experiences into compelling application materials.

Global.overview: Connect your curiosity and achievements into a cohesive personal story.
checklist: Write a 250-word draft personal statement
Ask mentors for feedback
Highlight academic depth and impact

US.overview: Focus on Common App essays, recommendations, and activity descriptions.
checklist: Draft your Common App essay with a STEM focus
Collect 2 recommendation letters early
Optimize your Activities section for clarity

UK.overview: Refine your UCAS statement and prepare for interview-style questions.
checklist: Complete UCAS personal statement drafts
Add reading and outreach activities to your statement
Prepare for Oxbridge interviews

Asia.overview: Adapt your statement of purpose for multiple university systems.
checklist: Prepare a statement for both UCAS and Common App
Gather supporting documents (grades, references)
Draft one reflection on your academic goals

quiz.q: What should your personal statement highlight?
opts: Curiosity, depth, and connection between academics and impact
quiz.correct: Curiosity, depth, and connection between academics and impact

stages.title: Final Preparation & Interviews
stages.description: Polish your confidence, readiness, and strategy for final submissions.

Global.overview: Bring together everything you’ve learned and practiced for confident applications.
checklist: Complete mock interviews
Submit all applications
Celebrate your effort and reflection

US.overview: Rehearse storytelling for alumni interviews and finalize application portals.
checklist: Conduct a mock interview with feedback
Submit Common App and supplements
Follow up with recommenders

UK.overview: Prepare for Oxbridge interviews with problem-solving sessions.
checklist: Review PAT-style interview problems
Simulate interviews under timed pressure
Finalize UCAS submission

Asia.overview: Coordinate with international university offices for document verification.
checklist: Confirm all transcripts and certificates
Practice interview questions in English
Submit final portfolios

quiz.q: What’s key for Oxbridge interview prep?
opts: Practicing problem-solving aloud under time pressure
quiz.correct: Practicing problem-solving aloud under time pressure
